general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and reports associated with Sharda University, including academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research, alongside administrative and developmental initiatives such as examination reports, the Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, leadership information, tenders, and skill enhancement programs. It also mentions unique offerings like the FM Radio station 'Suno Sharda-90.8FM', a mentoring portal 'Paramarsh', and international campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, as well as resources related to COVID-19 and cybercrime reporting.
